marathonLabel.description: A guideline mode where you attempt to clear a set amount of lines (or endless) with a rising difficulty

marathonDescription.message: Haal het doel! Stapel en verwijder regels, maar pas op, des te verder je gaat, des te sneller het spel wordt!
marathonDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.

masterLabel.description: A guideline mode where you attempt to clear a set amount of lines at insanely high speeds

masterDescription.message: Ongelooflijk snelle stapelactie! De wrede snelheiden van dit spel zullen het je zo moeilijk mogelijk maken tot het einde.
masterDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.

sprintLabel.description: A guideline mode where you attempt to clear an amount of lines as quick as possible

sprintDescription.message: Aarzel niet! Haal het lijnendoel zo snel als je kan in deze hogesnelheidsmodus.
sprintDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.

ultraLabel.description: A guideline mode where you have to score as many points as possible before the time runs out

ultraDescription.message: Elke regel telt! Zet zorgvuldig en snel setups op om zoveel mogelijk punten te scoren tot de tijd om is!
ultraDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.

comboLabel.description: A guideline mode where you have to clear the highest combo possible before the time runs out

comboDescription.message: Geen tijd te verliezen! Probeer zoveelmogelijk regels achterelkaar te wissen tot de tijd om is!
comboDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.

survivalLabel.description: A guideline mode where lines are constantly sent to the player's game and they have to survive the ever rising garbage

survivalDescription.message: Caution! Broken lines have started to rise from the bottom. If you can't keep up, you're definitely going to fail!
survivalDescription.description: Feel free to take any liberties as long you can accurately describe the mode in a way that's localized to the language.
